title: The Forbidden Rite
goal: Recharge the shard and learn its true purpose.
stakes_shift: Lyra must choose between her academic future and the world.

sections.title: The Heart of the Forge
sections.intent: Setting the stage for a major magical act.

scenes.summary: Lyra bypasses the Forge's security using her stolen tuning fork.
scenes.outcome: They gain access to the Solar Chamber.

scenes.summary: Kaelen places the shard in the focal point of the chamber.
scenes.outcome: The ritual begins, drawing massive amounts of power.

sections.title: The Vision of the Void
sections.intent: Reveal the true nature of the threat.

scenes.summary: The shard projects a holographic map of the entire galaxy, showing hundreds of stars going dark.
scenes.outcome: The starfall is a symptom of a galactic extinction event.

scenes.summary: A voice speaks through the shard—the entity trapped within.
scenes.outcome: The entity, 'Astra', asks for release to save the remaining stars.

scenes.summary: Kaelen realizes releasing Astra would break his family's eternal oath.
scenes.outcome: Kaelen decides to break the oath, choosing the future over the past.

scenes.summary: The High Council's mages arrive and attempt to seize the shard.
scenes.outcome: A magical battle erupts in the chamber.

scenes.summary: Vane's influence is felt as the mages' spells turn into void-fire.
scenes.outcome: The Council has been infiltrated by Vane's cult.

scenes.summary: Lyra triggers a controlled explosion to cover their retreat.
scenes.outcome: The Great Forge is destroyed, but they escape with the charged shard.

scenes.summary: Astra's voice remains in Kaelen's head, guiding him.
scenes.outcome: Kaelen now has a celestial passenger.

scenes.summary: They flee into the city's slums as the Forge collapses.
scenes.outcome: They are now the most wanted people in Aethelgard.
